page.title: 13OTHER CLUBS IN HARVEL
page.content:
{THE HARVEL DARBY & JOAN CLUB Harvel Darby & Joan Club was started under the auspices of the WRVS in l963 and has met every fortnight since then in Harvel Village Hall. There are now 25 members whose ages range from 60 to 95. Every Christmas a special lunch is arranged and served in the Village Hall with entertain- ments and presents for all.
{GRAVESEND GUIDES - KAY'S GARDEN Near to Meopham Green the Gravesend District Guides own a piece of land bought with a legacy from Kay Mason who was Divisional Secretary. It is available for small numbers of Guides for camps and for day long activities.
